item.description:
In response to members' suggestions - and many thanks to Rick for co-hosting! - we're kicking off 2010 with a walk/mini-hike thru the Middlesex Fells Reservation.

No doubt all that activity and fresh January air will get us hungry & thirsty, so we'll head to JJ Grimsby's (in Stoneham/Melrose) afterwards for grub, Irish coffee (or similar restorative beverages) and a relaxing remainder of the afternoon.

We're still figuring out exactly which trail(s) we'll do & exactly where to meet up - but I wanted to post the event now so that folks could get it into their diary.

Check out the Fells at:
http://www.mass.gov/d...
http://www.fells.org/...
http://www.fellsbiker...

Directions to Grimsby's:
http://jjgrimsbys.com...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking lot at JJ Grimsby's. It's a short walk from there to our entrance gate
item.name: Hiking in the Fells / Grub @ JJ Grimsby's
